acf.meta_description: Targeting Genetic Diseases at Their Source
acf.homepage_banner_text: We would like to extend our sympathies to the friends and family of Professor Claudio Rapezzi, who recently passed away. His massive contributions to the field of cardiology, and especially cardiac amyloidosis where he was a trailblazer, will live on.
acf.hiring_content:
we’re hiring now

BridgeBio is committed to developing leaders as well as drugs. We seek individuals whose passion for creating life-changing medicines will inspire hands-on engagement and the dogged pursuit of novel solutions in the face of adversity.
acf.our_work_content:
Support our work

Each day, we seek to bridge the gap between remarkable advancements in genetic science and patients with unmet needs. We seek investors who are interested in helping  achieve the goal of creating novel solutions for unique  patient populations.
